content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TEST
      operator: longer_than
      value: 40
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.64
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when length of --TEST is greater than 40.
Outcome:
  Message: Value length of --TEST is greater than 40.
  Output Variables:
    - --TEST
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '64'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Because of limitations of SAS v5 Transport files,
                  the lengths of data values cannot exceed 200 characters. Because
                  --TEST values may become column labels upon transformation, the
                  SDTM additionally restricts them to 40 characters.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.5.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when length of --TEST is greater than 40.

Outcome.Message: Value length of --TEST is greater than 40.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Because of limitations of SAS v5 Transport files, the lengths of data values cannot exceed 200 characters. Because --TEST values may become column labels upon transformation, the SDTM additionally restricts them to 40 characters.
